product_name: CliniqueAcne Solutions Cleansing Gel with Salicylic Acid
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingHSA/FSA eligibleClinique Acne Solutions Cleansing Gel is a refreshing, medicated gel cleanser with 2% salicylic acid. Helps clear acne and prevent future breakouts.
details: DetailsBenefitsFormulated for acne-prone skins.Helps clear breakouts and blackheads.Helps control oil and unclog pores.Skin feels fresh, soft, and smooth.Paraben-free. Phthalate-free.Oil-free. Non-acnegenic.Free of denatured alcohol.SLS-free. Gluten-free.Allergy tested. Fragrance-free.Dermatologist tested.For best results, use the Clinique Acne Solutions Clear Skin System consistently to help get breakouts under control: cleanse with Cleansing Foam or Cleansing Gel, exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, and treat with Clinical Clearing Gel.Key IngredientsSalicylic acid and acetyl glucosamine help clear dead skin cells that can contribute to clogged pores.Item 2286506How To UseUse face cleanser twice a day, morning and night.Lather between palms with warm water.Massage over makeup-free face, avoiding eye area.Rinse thoroughly; pat skin dry.Follow with Acne Solutions Clarifying Lotion.To help treat breakouts, use Clinical Clearing Gel before moisturizer. Apply a thin layer to entire face twice a day after cleansing, or spot-apply if you are using another leave-on acne treatment.Finish with a lightweight, oil-free hydrator like Dramatically Different Oil-Free Gel.IngredientsActive: Salicylic Acid 2.0%. Inactive: Water\Aqua\Eau, Glycerin, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Lauramidopropyl Betaine, Butylene Glycol, Sucrose, Sodium Hyaluronate, Gentiana Lutea (Gentian) Root Extract, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Caffeine, Acetyl Glucosamine, Laureth-2, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Sodium Sulfate, Benzophenone-4, Sodium Hydroxide, EDTA, Disodium EDTA, BHT, Phenoxyethanol, Blue 1 (CI 42090).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use face cleanser twice a day, morning and night.Lather between palms with warm water.Massage over makeup-free face, avoiding eye area.Rinse thoroughly; pat skin dry.Follow with Acne Solutions Clarifying Lotion.To help treat breakouts, use Clinical Clearing Gel before moisturizer. Apply a thin layer to entire face twice a day after cleansing, or spot-apply if you are using another leave-on acne treatment.Finish with a lightweight, oil-free hydrator like Dramatically Different Oil-Free Gel.

reviews.headline: I have bought this before and I will buy it again..
reviews.comments: My skin feels so soft and clean after I use this gel. No dryness, just  soft and refreshed!

reviews.headline: Terrible almost pure liquid !
reviews.comments: Ugh I really dislike this "gel" its more like water. This goes right in between your fingers wasting so much! It doesnt sud up or act like a soap in any way!! Please bring back the acne bar of  soap ! We miss it !!

reviews.headline: It's pricey but good.
reviews.comments: Try to buy things when you have a coupon so it isn't so pricey.   Only some coupons apply to this brand unfortunately.  But some do.  Anyway, step up from the old discontinued neutrogena acne wash that was a similar color to the Clinique acne bottle.

reviews.headline: Great Acne fighting product
reviews.comments: I purchased this product for my daughter who has acne prone skin. Other things she had used over the counter for teenage girls have not worked. It does not irritate her skin or cause excessive dryness. She loves it.

reviews.headline: I will continue to bye the product
reviews.comments: This product is amazing I wish there was something like this in the 80s lol this is a must buy ladies and gents

reviews.headline: I love this I recommend to anyone with breakouts
reviews.comments: I use this product every night. I have noticed differences in just one week!

reviews.headline: Horrible for oily, sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I bought this product because I had 2 or 3 stubborn pimples that would not go away. I have cystic acne breakouts from time to time but I can usually keep it under control. I have been using this for a month and my skin looks worse than it ever has. I have breakouts in areas I never had them before and now my face is covered in pimples, big and small. Every time one goes away 2 or 3 more pop up. Do not use if you have oily, sensitive skin! I'm going back to my old skincare routine and hopefully I can reverse the damage I've caused using this face wash. Worst mistake ever!

reviews.headline: This Acne wash is excellent with clearing up my Acne
reviews.comments: It cleared my skin and left my skin soft and clean,I recommend this cleaner if anyone who has acne

reviews.headline: Cleared my acne
reviews.comments: Definitely helped clear up some hormonal acne i was having near my jaw and chin. I use it mostly at night and wake up with less inflammation. Make sure to moisturize enough after using!

reviews.headline: horrible
reviews.comments: I used this along with the clarifying lotion and clearing gel religiously for 2 months and my acne is worse than its ever been. I was trying to give it time to "clear my face of impurities" since I started a new treatment but i am so disappointed. between the 3 products I've lost way too much money. very frustrating. I'll go back to my drugstore product that only gave me occasional breakouts

reviews.headline: just bad (dry/sensitive acne prone skin)
reviews.comments: This is way too harsh to use on your face, let alone on acne prone skin. I took it out of circulation and tried to reuse it as a chemical exfoliant for my keratosis in the shower. What a mistake! It chemically burned my hands, causing my fingers to peel for over a month.

reviews.headline: The only thing that fixed my maskne
reviews.comments: I work in a hospital lab and have been wearing a mask all day everyday at work since the pandemic started. My skin was getting so gross from the maskne. I started using this back in February of this year, and also swap it out with the foam version (they're the same). It works So well. I still get a couple of little hormonal zits every now and then, but the maskne is gone. I use this with the acne solutions clarifying lotion and plan on using these products for the rest of my life.

reviews.headline: My FAVORITE skin care brand for acne/extremely oil skin!
reviews.comments: I alternate between this & the foam for my face!

reviews.headline: Teen swears by this
reviews.comments: My daughter has tried many different cleansing options from Neutrogena to witch hazel, she loves this cleansing gel. She says it makes her skin so clean and helps prevent pimples.

reviews.headline: Broke me out
reviews.comments: Broke me out really bad. It was way too harsh for my skin and sucked out all moister.

reviews.headline: HOLY GRAIL!!!!!!!
reviews.comments: This is the actual best cleanser EVERRRRR I use this every night and mild facial soap in the mornings and it keeps my skin so clear! If I ever have any kind of bump all I have to do is put the TINIEST amount of this cleanser on the bump and over night it disappears! EVERY. SINGLE. TIME! I have used this cleanser for 5 years consistently and am still in love with it! I have tried a few other cleaners over this past 5 years and end up broken out after 1 wash and immediately returning it for this one! I do not have any affiliation with this brand it is just my tried and true!

reviews.headline: I would not buy this again
reviews.comments: My face is broke out worse since using this product. I would not purchase this product again. In fact, I need to return it & purchase something else.

reviews.headline: best face wash i've ever tried
reviews.comments: I have a combination of cystic acne, hormonal breakouts and due to masks, mascne (mask acne), my face has never had so many breakouts and it was quite painful. I compared a ton of different products, tested some of them out and didn't see results. Then i came across this face wash. I've only been on it for a few days now but it's made a noticeable difference and my face has never felt so clean. I also have very sensitive skin and it doesn't effect it at all. I highly recommend this product, it's the best price and has great results.

reviews.headline: Immediate improvement for my acne!!
reviews.comments: I use this product along with Clinique's Acne Solutions Clearing Gel and Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ every morning and night and I've only been following this skin care routine for a week and my skin has progressed so much! I have combination skin and I couldn't be happier with how much these products boosted up my confidence. The only thing I can say is if some people do not see a difference, make sure you use these products religiously. You can never say something doesn't work out if you don't use it EVERYDAY. Other than that, would definitely recommend. WORTH EVERY PENNY!!

reviews.headline: Not good for cystic acne
reviews.comments: I suffer from extreme cystic acne and had high hopes for this line unfortunately it has made my acne so much worse and is very drying even after using moisturizer throughout the day

properties.name: Describe Yourself

values.label: I have combination skin.. and hormonal acnce

values.label: Does feel like i am burning my skin
Won't dry out your skin and has no fragrance.
The product is super light and gentle.

display_values: Does feel like i am burning my skin
The product is super light and gentle.
Won't dry out your skin and has no fragrance.

faceoff_positive.comments: I spent $200 on dermadoctor products and while I thought it was helping, it is NOTHING compared to the trio I used. I bought the travel version of this (with the yellow lotion) as well as the acne solutions trio (which came with a foam cleanser but I prefer this one). Incredible! I had these underground pimples that when reallyyyy squeezed (and sometimes not even then) would come out like a blackhead does but they never went away :/ this set REMOVED THEM almost entirely and now I don't have bumpy highlighter on my face anymore. I oftentimes just use a makeup wipe at night and use the set in the AM and it still leaves me with stellar skin. I don't know why I didn't start using Clinique sooner!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Fixed the undergrounders!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have combination skin with a lot of blackheads and was freaking out around my chin area. Although my t zone is oily, my cheeks and forehead are dry. I purchased this product hoping it would help clear up some of my blackheads and pimples that we're going around my chin while not being to drying on the skin. Although it certainly helped clear up some of the pimples around my chin it did nothing for my blackheads and actually made my skin extremely dull.  it does lather up nicely yet somehow it never felt like it actually removed all of my make up and my face never really felt clean after as it usually does with other cleansers . If you have very oily skin this might work for you, but this is definitely not good for my combination skin.
faceoff_negative.headline: Only for extremely oily skin

rollup.name: Acne Solutions Cleansing Gel with Salicylic Acid
